Package effects

Class TextFadeEffect

java.lang.Object
effects.Effect
effects.TextFadeEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
EngineComponent
public class TextFadeEffect
extends Effect
This Effect class is used to show a piece of text, and have it slowly fade out and rise out of position

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    private static class  TextFadeEffect.Frame
    This nested class serves to abstract away the information pertaining to each frame of the Effect

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.Color color
    The color of the text at the start of the effect
    protected int riseAmount
    The amount of space the text will rise throughout the effect animation
    protected Text text
    The text to display

    Fields inherited from class effects.Effect

    endFrame, frame, frames, fx, gameInstance, x, y

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    TextFadeEffect​(int x, int y, Text text, java.awt.Color color, int riseAmount)
    Instantiates the effect by providing the frames to the superclass.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private EffectFrame[] generateFrames​(int amount)
    Generates the frames for this effect, with each frame being slightly higher and more transparent than the last.

    Methods inherited from class effects.Effect

    paintComponent, provideFrames, update

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • color

      protected final java.awt.Color color
      The color of the text at the start of the effect

    • text

      protected final Text text
      The text to display

    • riseAmount

      protected final int riseAmount
      The amount of space the text will rise throughout the effect animation

  • Constructor Details

    • TextFadeEffect

      public TextFadeEffect​(int x, int y, Text text, java.awt.Color color, int riseAmount)
      Instantiates the effect by providing the frames to the superclass.
      Parameters:
      x - The position of the effect on the X-axis
      y - The position of the effect on the Y-axis
      text - The text to be displayed during the effect
      color - The color of the text at the start of the effect
      riseAmount - How far the text will rise (y-axis) during the effect
      See Also:
      generateFrames(int), Effect.provideFrames(EffectFrame[])

  • Method Details

    • generateFrames

      private EffectFrame[] generateFrames​(int amount)
      Generates the frames for this effect, with each frame being slightly higher and more transparent than the last. The frames will last for 'amount' of game ticks, and at the end should be completely transparent.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of frames to generate
      Returns:
      EffectFrame[] The list of frames generated
      See Also:
      TextFadeEffect.Frame
